Package org.fax4j.util

Provides general utilities used internally by the fax4j library.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Connection<T> This class defines basic common connection capabilities.
ConnectionFactory<T> This class defines the basic common connection factory capabilities.
ProcessExecutor The process executer enables to execute native processes.
Implementing classes must be statless and thread safe.
SpiUtil.TemplateParameterEncoder This interface defines a template parameter encoder.
 

Class Summary
AbstractCloseable Defines a basic closable class which prevents errors from being thrown during the close invocation.
AbstractConnectionFactory<T> This class provides the basic common connection factory capabilities.
AbstractFax4JConnectionFactory<T> This class provides the basic common connection factory capabilities.
AbstractProcessExecutor The process executer enables to execute native processes.
This class provides only partial implementation of the executer.
Implementing classes must be statless and thread safe.
CloseableResourceManager This class is used to hold/release closeable resources.
All registered closeable resources will be closed when the JVM exists.
ConnectionImpl<T> This class provides the basic common connection implementation.
DefaultProcessExecutor The process executer enables to execute native processes.
This class provides the default implementation of the executer.
IOHelper This is an internal IO utility class.
IOHelper.OutputReadThread This class reads the output of the process.
LibraryConfigurationLoader This is an internal utility used to load the library configuration.
ProcessExecutorHelper This is an internal process execution utility class.
ProcessExecutorHelper.ProcessOutput This holds the process output.
ReflectionHelper Holds general functions for working with reflection and dynamic invocation of code/classes.
SpiUtil This is an internal general utility class.
SpiUtil.URLTemplateParameterEncoder This class implements the URL encoder.
 

Package org.fax4j.util Description

Provides general utilities used internally by the fax4j library.
